title: How to Import or Export Figma Variables with Plugin
content: How to import or export Figma Variables with plugin? - The Design System Guide Close Figma Variables # How to import or export Figma Variables with plugin? Romina Kavcic #### Export/Import Variables Export variables from one file and import them to another. It's great for migrating libraries, or when you downloaded library from the community and youâ€™d like to import or update variables in your existing design system. ğŸ”— Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1256972111705530093/export-import-variables] #### Variables Pro ğŸ”— Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1264578192495051449/variables-pro-swap-import-export-variables ] #### #### Styles and Variables Organizer ğŸ”— Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/816627069580757929/styles-variables-organizer ] #### #### Design Tokens plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/888356646278934516/design-tokens ] ğŸ”— Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/888356646278934516/design-tokens ] ## Design Tokens Manager You can export or import Figma Variables Export Styles to JSON files Import Tokens from JSON files ğŸ”— Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1263743870981744253/design-tokens-manager ] ## Tokens Studio Gives you the ability to use Design Tokens that can be used for a whole range of design options, from border radii or spacer units to semantic color and typography styles that are able to reference other tokens. It allows you to change tokens and see these changes applied to the whole document, its styles or just a selection. Generate Tokens with the UI or with your own JSON. Create or update Type, Color or Shadow Styles based on tokens. Reference tokens in each other to create type scales, container paddings or semantic colors. ğŸ”— Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/843461159747178978/tokens-studio-for-figma] Next question How to Import JSON into Figma?
